amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of EPA funds provided for Hazardous Substance Superfund cleanup activities from being used to reimburse those responsible for creating a hazardous waste site for cleanup costs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of any funds made available to EPA for reimbursement to responsible parties for cleanup costs of hazardous waste sites.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A037) Failed by recorded vote: 142 - 274 (Roll no. 279).
